abstract: David Allen reviews performance by Christopher Houlihan of classical and contemporary symphonies played on restored pipe organ during dedication celebration at Co-Cathedral of St Joseph in Prospect Heights.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Houlihan’s concert was part of a rededication of the organ.

headline.main: Review: Christopher Houlihan Adds Shine to a Restored Organ at Co-Cathedral of St. Joseph
headline.print_headline: Inspired Musician  Adds Concert Shine to a Restored Organ

snippet: Mr. Houlihan’s concert was part of a rededication of the organ.
